title: U.S. Treasury Secretary Issues Huge $2 Trillion Crypto Prediction As Bitcoin Price Suddenly Soars
description: U.S. Treasury secretary Scott Bessent has issued a huge crypto market prediction....
content:
Bitcoin has rocketed higher over the last month, helped by fears stoked by Tesla billionaire Elon Musk that the U.S. dollar could be teetering on the verge of collapse.
